comment: So they manage to provide a whole lot of data, except a critical little nugget. Gay men are well over half the patients who present at STI clinics, and are probably the source of the emerging antibiotic-resistant pathogens.
amr:
# ::snt So they manage to provide a whole lot of data, except a critical little nugget. Gay men are well over half the patients who present at STI clinics, and are probably the source of the emerging antibiotic-resistant pathogens.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (ii / infer-01
            :ARG1 (m2 / manage-02
                  :ARG0 (t / they)
                  :ARG1 (p / provide-01
                        :ARG0 t
                        :ARG1 (d / data
                              :quant (l / lot
                                    :mod (w / whole))
                              :ARG2-of (e / except-01
                                    :ARG1 (n / nugget
                                          :ARG1-of (c / critical-02)
                                          :mod (l2 / little)))))))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (ii2 / include-91
                  :ARG1 (m3 / man
                        :ARG1-of (g / gay-01))
                  :ARG2 (p2 / patient
                        :ARG1-of (p3 / present-01
                              :ARG2 (c2 / clinic
                                    :mod (d2 / disease
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "STI")))))
                  :ARG3 (o / over
                        :op1 "1/2"
                        :degree (w2 / well)))
            :op2 (p4 / probable
                  :domain (s / source-02
                        :ARG0 m3
                        :ARG1 (b / bacterium
                              :ARG0-of (r / resist-01
                                    :ARG1 (a2 / antibiotic))
                              :ARG0-of (e2 / emerge-01))))))

comment: You shouldn't generalize a specific group or call them names, use thoughtful words in your discussion and it will help get your point out.

                  :op2 (c / call-01
